resources.string: Kotlin requires semi-colons at the end of every statement.
Adults have fewer bones than babies do.
There are more cells of bacteria in your body than there are human cells.
It costs the U.S. Mint more to make pennies and nickels than the coins are actually worth.
Your knowledge is undoubtedly top notch!
You must consult the elders for additional training.
Are you really sure you want to cheat?
